short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Activate Backspace shortcuts to navigate in history object

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The original extension to bring back the Backspace key shortcut as navigation for history.back() (backspace) and history.forward() (shift+backspace). Supports blacklisting of pages, recognizes input fields and works on Linux, OSX and Windows.

Version 3.2.0 integrates the missing migration of exceptions from versions <3.x.x
